agents.name: Agent1
agents.note: Completed US-RPI-011: Implement System Telemetry Logging. Created src/hardware/telemetry_logger.py with TelemetryLogger class. JSON logging with RotatingFileHandler (100MB, 7 backups). Logs timestamp, power_source, battery_v, battery_ma, battery_pct, cpu_temp, disk_free_mb every 10s (configurable). Integrates with UpsMonitor. Added 57 unit tests. 963 tests pass.

agents.name: Agent2
agents.note: Completed US-009: Refactor drive modules. Created drive/types.py (DriveState, DetectorState enums, DriveSession, DetectorConfig, DetectorStats dataclasses, constants), drive/exceptions.py (3 exceptions), drive/detector.py (DriveDetector), drive/helpers.py (6 functions). Updated original drive_detector.py to re-export. 57 drive_detector tests pass, 324 total tests pass.

agents.name: Agent3
agents.note: Completed US-043: Create simulator CLI commands. Implemented SimulatorCli class with keyboard commands (p=pause/resume, f=inject failure, c=clear failures, s=status, h=help, q=quit). Non-blocking input via background thread. 44 tests passing.
